name: Fishing Camp
description:
A Camp is a location on a coast or shore containing one or more harbors where ships can dock and transfer people or cargo to or from land.
A Fishing Camp is a camp or harbour for landing and distributing fish. It may be a recreational facility, but it is usually commercial. A fishing camp is the only camp that depends on an ocean product, and depletion of fish may cause a fishing camp to be uneconomical.

# Game Features..........

* 10 Beautiful Levels.

* Just make a path to Fishing camp for boats using your tap on screen.

* After reach in Fishing camp just wait sometimes for loading fishes.

* After loading, make a another path for get out from Fishing camp.

* Don't try to make accident with another boats.

* You will get a red symbol for which direction the boats are coming.

* After finished each level you'll play next level.
